product_name: REI Mt. Baker Soft-Shell Gloves - Girls'
long_description: The comfortable REI Mt. Baker soft-shell gloves keep girls' hands cozy and dry when wind and wetness are unleashed. Polyester soft shells and waterproof/breathable inserts block moisture and wind. Polyester insulation adds warmth without a lot of bulkiness; cozy polyester linings add comfort and wick moisture away from the hands. Synthetic leather palms are grippy and durable; thumbs sport a soft nose-wipe panel. Gauntlets offer extended coverage; closures cinch and uncinch with ease.
short_description: The comfortable REI Mt. Baker soft-shell gloves keep girls' hands cozy and dry when wind and wetness are unleashed.
